data.title: Soft and comfortable
data.body:
The T-shirt features a vibrant and accurate representation of the University of Cincinnati’s logo, which stands out beautifully against the fabric. The colors are true to the university’s official palette, and the graphic has remained intact even after several washes, showing no signs of fading or peeling.

The shirt is made from a soft and comfortable material, perfect for wearing all day, whether I’m attending classes, cheering at a game, or just lounging around. It breathes well during warmer days and has kept its shape and softness wash after wash.
